name: Hotel Hazard
description:
You are a bonafide bunny hotel manager who only has 1 room left in your hotel! Various animals are lining up who all have different preferences as to how they like their room to be decorated. Pick up the items in the storage room to fill up the hotel room! It is up to you to figure out which item they like in their room by watching your score.

Controls:

E - Pick up Item
F - Place Item
LShift - Run
Space - Assign to room

Notes:

- Objects can only be picked up from the side if you're facing them.
- To assign an animal to the room, stand next to them and press space.
- Sprinting costs stamina, which refills by itself over time.

Contributors:

VDalisay and Kythaela
